website_summaries.verdict: Effectively reads magnetic and sound waves to locate hidden signals.
pros: Quickly becomes your best friend in terms of hidden device detection
One of the more versatile products available that doesn't discriminate from detecting GPS data to mobile phone devices as well
An easy favorite for those in need of a product that acts fast
cons: May not work effectively in crowded environments where cross signals occur

customer_reviews.title: Not For Serious Work
customer_reviews.text: Buy this item only if you are not up against serious situations of locating devices emitting RF signals. Expect to pay in the area of $500 for the real deal that will locate as you need it to. You have got to have a device that will tell you the exact frequency you are following and the ability to filter out other signals you dont want. You also need to have a idea of the frequency the device you are searching for is emitting. The correct device for this type of work are generally not sold as spy equipment.
customer_reviews.author: markus

customer_reviews.title: This Device is Everything I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I tested this against cameras I have in my house, and it worked beautifully. I tested it on a single recording device, and it also worked well. I cannot be happier with this device. More importantly, Bizlink has some of the best customer service I have used in electronics in a long time. Louisa is especially knowledgeable and coached me through everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product after a while you get used to how to measure the dBm. Truly amazing product , I am planning to buy couple more
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy quality product takes a little practice but then your ready to go Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to figure out how to use at first, but once you get it works great!

customer_reviews.title: Bug detector
customer_reviews.text: I like this bug detector. Gives you piece of mind staying in an unfamiliar place
customer_reviews.author: Holly Steineke

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Exactly what I expected. Used it to help find an RF leak that was causing door lock issues.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend he has said that it works great

customer_reviews.text: Did not detect two recording bugs I used to test
customer_reviews.author: Bob Neuberger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Being realistic, one cant expect that this product is going to do the job of one costing 10 times more. But it works for me, meeting my expectations. Instructions could be better, and so would a more comprehensive FAQ. However, I messaged the tech reps and got prompt results, answering all the questions I had. I highly recommend it as a value product. Great battery life by the way.
customer_reviews.author: jarmK$

customer_reviews.title: Blocking a kind of Macro
customer_reviews.text: This device has been working well almost everywhere to detect the strange signal with the beeper sound and red light. I am very surprised to hear the beeper sounds because of the small alaming process. However the sounds has not been get out of a kind of very strange and wired macro I guess in South Korea.
customer_reviews.author: Hyeyeong Jang

customer_reviews.title: Chinese junk don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is completely useless because it is a high tech device with no instructions whatsoever. No YouTube. No manual. No response from seller. I’m sure it might work but without any sort of detailed information on how it operates it’s nothing but a paperweight
customer_reviews.author: KennyMac

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. It would go off while pointing it at the wall. It went off while pointing it at the dresser and at my mattress. I will be getting a refund. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: In order to identify a cam lens, you must be approximately within 10 degrees of straight on to the lens. The signal response is basic but fair and can see some decent applications for use. However, I’ve charged this twice. I just pulled the plug out of the wall and it fell apart exposing two leads straight to 110V. CHEAP and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: jpk

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to find hidden devices
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to turn it on, figure out how it works, but actually finding a hidden device with it is difficult. You have to make sure all wifi signals are turned off completely. It will also pick up other waves, like from your cell phone. I recommend getting a detector that gives you a readout of what kind of signal it is picking up. That will take the guesswork out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Snake Oil
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. I tried using it to find cameras we hid in a room and it did not locate any of them after several attempts. Don't waste your money.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt do anything. I regret spending that much on this piece of crap :( really disappointed

customer_reviews.title: They should raise the price on these because they really work.

customer_reviews.title: It has some limited purpose
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly documented for instructions and use. It still has use, but it could be more powerful with better instructions. It supplied the security we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ITS A MUST HAVE WHEN TRAVELING
customer_reviews.text: Found device very easy to use. The manual is good but the print is very small. Had to read with magnifying glass. The straight antennae is for RFI signals while the coiled antennae is a magnet sensor GPS holding devices and center for pinhole camera detection by reflection back to this device. Would recommend this for travel and staying in motel/ hotels. Safe trip. Not sure if lithium battery is replaceable but charging adapter is included.
customer_reviews.author: ebodine

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and pretty simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and probably spend about 250 nights a year in hotels and after so many reports about ppl leaving things in hotel rooms I decided to feel safer. After figuring out how to use it I did checks on my own equipment to see if it was accurate. It alerted to all the things I tested in my own home which gives me confidence that it will be accurate. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: blossomjetson

customer_reviews.title: Product is okay
customer_reviews.text: I currently was sent a second one to work with and after getting through the kinks as far as looking for signals regarding bugs it was able to detect that. I does not however detect GPS signal. The translation in the manual is not great as this product is made in China. Reference to magnetic field however detecting the magnet force from a magnet probably. As they would put a GPS in a magnetic carrying case. To be honest you may not need a case or GPS tracker if you can mess with the car's computer. Most Cars have GPS with those cars.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend without reservations.
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first till I hid tablet and camera and searched for it. Scanned room, found within moments. Instructions difficult to follow, UNLESS you follow step by step. Frankly expected to return as I thought It was a gimmick. No longer travel without it, showed friends. Others have purchased with no complaints. No connection to vendor/company
customer_reviews.author: Kneelzsteex

customer_reviews.title: Helped me find a bug
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had suspsions a family member was planting bugs in our house after too many coincidences. I bought this hoping it would help me find one and it did! I had to turn off all the WiFi in the house and set the devices to airplane mode. I reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Now I’m at ease!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! After a couple months of stress and paranoia, my mind was finally put to rest after using this product! Happy to know I wasn’t going crazy once listening and gps devices were found in my home and vehicle. Instructions were very clear and easy to understand which made product a breeze to use. And to top it off customer service is excellent! I highly recommend this product to anyone that needs to be assured of their privacy!
customer_reviews.author: EShayne

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: Original review: "Unless you're right up on the camera and directly in front of it, you're not going to find it. The signal detection is everywhere. I can have it right next to a device and it detect nothing, though turn the sensitivity up a little and it goes off the charts." Edit: I'd like to update this. I have returned the prodect and they did send me another to see if it was just a defective product. I don't believe it was, I think it's just the nature of what it is. Anyway, I have updated it to 4 stars since they did go out of their way to rectify the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Cushard

customer_reviews.title: It beeps at everything
customer_reviews.text: Well my brother in law put little secret recording devices in his work trucks, his employees personal vehicles and my moms house. So I bought this to find them. I did better without it.

customer_reviews.title: Basically is a toy

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool - must for frequent travelers
customer_reviews.text: Handy tool. It is a must for frequent travelers. It helped to locate my lost Alexa remote. The instructions were detailed, still it took me a little bit to get a hang of its detection pattern. It is going to be in my suitcase everytime we travel. Nice packaging.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Excellent After Sales Support !!
customer_reviews.text: This product - Anti Spy RF Detector Wireless Bug Detector Signal for Hidden Camera Laser Lens is a great product with lot of functionality for detecting hidden cameras. The product comes in a good packaging and is very light in weight to carry anywhere. The product guide that comes with this is a good guide for new user. But what makes this product an excellent buy is their AWESOME AFTER SALES SUPPORT from their customer service team. The customer support team is very prompt in response and can walk through like an tutor for any new user. I will recommended this product from this buyer !!
customer_reviews.author: SPS

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to detect wireless devices and camera devices. I was surprised that this works and the instructions are well written. I tested against a smart phone, wireless router, laptop, hidden nanny cam, camcorder, and digital camera with wifi; It found them all.

customer_reviews.title: This Anti-Spy Bug Detector works very well and the price is nice.
customer_reviews.text: This anti spy bug detector works very well in finding all devices that are Wi-Fi and emit a RF signal. It also does a great job finding hidden cameras by reflecting the red light LEDs included on the anti spy bug detector device. This feature is very helpful in finding hidden cameras that are recording to a memory card. The magnet detector mode is very helpful in finding devices that are attached by magnets and are not emitting a RF signal. The included instructions are very helpful and fully explained how to use the device and obtain the best and accurate results in finding hidden spy devices.

product_meta.title: Anti Spy RF Detector Wireless Bug Detector Signal for Hidden Camera Laser Lens GSM Listening Device Finder Radar Radio Scanner Wireless Signal Alarm
feature_bullets: 【Main Feature】Can Detect 1.2G/2.4G/5.8G Wireless camera ,hidden wireless camera and wireless eavesdropping；Can Detect all of bugs and locators with Mobile 2G/3G/4G Card,Detector range:1MHz-8GHz.

【Ultra High Sensitivity】Built with upgrade chip set,JMDHKK signal detector is more stable and accurate with strong anti-interference,we continuously upgrade our product with up-to date technology and chip set.

【Multiple Functional】JMDHKK signal detector is 3 in 1 detector that helps to find hidden wireless and wired camera,unwanted GPS tracker,wireless wiretapping device,and sense electromagnetic leakage from microwaves.It provides comprehensive anti-spy solution for Anti Sneak Shot/Anti Tracking/Anti Wiretapping.3 detection modes for your choice include RF signal detection,Magnetic Field detection to locate magnet used to mount GPS tracker onto vehicle,Camera Lens Finder to find hidden camera lenses.

【Compact and Portable】Compact and light weighted.You can take it anywhere you want.A must have for your travel and stay in hotel.Easy to use,with audible buzzer alarm and vibration alarm,the closer the detector to transmitting bug device,the louder and faster the alarm becomes,10 level signal indicator lights will be fully on when it is close enough to the bug device.Continuously adjust the detection sensitivity from high to low to shorten the detection range in order to pinpoint the bug device

【Continued Guaranteed free Customer Support】Lifetime warranty. Our customer support team will provide lifetime professional support.Please contact us if you have any question about our detector. We will come up with quick assistance and support.
